message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.RO, cs.SY, cs.DS 

The paper deals with the problem of Inverse Reinforcement Learning (IRL), which is a subfield of machine learning and artificial intelligence. The paper proposes a gradient-based IRL approach that simultaneously estimates the system's dynamics, which involves optimization and control theory. Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-categories are cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), and cs.RO (Robotics). The paper also deals with Markov Decision Processes (MDP), which is a subfield of control theory and optimization, making cs.SY (Systems and Control) another likely sub-category. Finally, the paper involves data analysis and statistical modeling, which makes cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) a possible sub-category as well.
